3 supervoxel_parameters::supervoxel_parameters(){
4  this->disable_transform = this->DISABLE_TRANSFORM;
5  this->voxel_resolution = this->VOXEL_RESOLUTION;
6  this->seed_resolution = this->SEED_RESOLUTION;
7  this->color_importance = this->COLOR_IMPORTANCE;
8  this->spatial_importance = this->SPATIAL_IMPORTANCE;
9  this->normal_importance = this->NORMAL_IMPORTANCE;
10 
11  this->concavity_tolerance_threshold = this->CONCAVITY_TOLERANCE_THRESHOLD;
12  this->smoothness_threshold = this->SMOOTHNESS_THRESHOLD;
13  this->min_segment_size = this->MIN_SEGMENT_SIZE;
14  this->use_extended_convexity = this->USE_EXTENDED_CONVEXITY;
15  this->use_sanity_criterion = this->USE_SANITY_CRITERION;
16 
17  this->zmin = this->ZMIN;
18  this->zmax = this->ZMAX;
19  this->th_points = this->TH_POINTS;

86 void lccp_segmentation::reset(){
87  this->cloud_->points.resize(0);
88  this->detected_objects_.resize(0);
89  this->lccp_labeled_cloud_->points.resize(0);
90  this->labeled_voxel_cloud_->points.resize(0);
91  this->normal_cloud_->points.resize(0);
92  this->supervoxel_clusters_.clear();
93  this->supervoxel_adjacency_.clear();
94  set_default_parameters();
95 }

106  << "concavity_tolerance_threshold: "<<(double)this->concavity_tolerance_threshold<<std::endl
107  << "smoothness_threshold: "<<(double)this->smoothness_threshold<<std::endl
108  << "min_segment_size: "<<(int)this->min_segment_size<<std::endl
109  << "use_extended_convexity: "<<(bool)this->use_extended_convexity<<std::endl
110  << "use_sanity_criterion: "<<(bool)this->use_sanity_criterion<<std::endl
111  << "\n Other parameters \n"
112  << "zmin: "<<(double)this->zmin<<std::endl
113  << "zmax: "<<(double)this->zmax<<std::endl
114  << "th_points: "<<(int)this->th_points<<std::endl;

252 
253 void lccp_segmentation::addSupervoxelConnectionsToViewer(PointT &supervoxel_center,
254  PointCloud &adjacent_supervoxel_centers, std::string supervoxel_name, boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer){
255  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints> points = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPoints>::New();
256  vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> cells = vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray>::New();
257  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine> polyLine = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyLine>::New();
258  //Iterate through all adjacent points, and add a center point to adjacent point pair
259  PointCloud::iterator adjacent_itr = adjacent_supervoxel_centers.begin();
260  for( ; adjacent_itr != adjacent_supervoxel_centers.end(); ++adjacent_itr){
261  points->InsertNextPoint(supervoxel_center.data);
262  points->InsertNextPoint(adjacent_itr->data);
263  }
264  //Create a polydata to store everything
265  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> polyData = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
266  //Add the points to the dataset
267  polyData->SetPoints(points);
268  polyLine->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds(points->GetNumberOfPoints());
269  for(unsigned int i = 0; i<points->GetNumberOfPoints();i++)
270  polyLine->GetPointIds()->SetId(i,i);
271  cells->InsertNextCell(polyLine);
272  //Add the lines to the dataset
273  polyData->SetLines(cells);
274  viewer->addModelFromPolyData(polyData, supervoxel_name);
275 }
276 
277 void lccp_segmentation::detectObjectsOnTable(CloudPtr cloud, double zmin, double zmax, pcl::PointIndices::Ptr objectIndices, bool filter_input_cloud){
278  //objects for storing point clouds
279  CloudPtr plane(new PointCloud);
280  CloudPtr convexHull(new PointCloud);
281 
282  //Get the plane model, if present
283  pcl::SACSegmentation<PointT> segmentation;
284  segmentation.setInputCloud(cloud);
285  segmentation.setModelType(pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
286  segmentation.setMethodType(pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
287  segmentation.setDistanceThreshold(0.01);
288  segmentation.setOptimizeCoefficients(true);
289  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr planeIndices(new pcl::PointIndices);
290  segmentation.segment(*planeIndices, this->plane_coefficients_);
291 
292  if(planeIndices->indices.size() == 0)
293  std::cout<<"Could not find a plane in the scene."<<std::endl;
294  else{
295  //Copy the points of the plane to a new cloud
296  pcl::ExtractIndices<PointT> extract;
297  extract.setInputCloud(cloud);
298  extract.setIndices(planeIndices);
299  extract.filter(*plane);
300 
301  //Retrive the convex hull
302  pcl::ConvexHull<PointT> hull;
303  hull.setInputCloud(plane);
304  hull.setDimension(2);
305  hull.reconstruct(*convexHull);
306 
307  //redundant check
308  if(hull.getDimension() == 2){
309  //prism object
310  pcl::ExtractPolygonalPrismData<PointT> prism;
311  prism.setInputCloud(cloud);
312  prism.setInputPlanarHull(convexHull);
313  prism.setHeightLimits(zmin, zmax);
314  prism.segment(*objectIndices);
315  extract.setIndices(objectIndices);
316  if(filter_input_cloud)
317  extract.filter(*cloud);
318  }
319  else std::cout<<"The chosen hull is not planar."<<std::endl;
320  this->table_plane_cloud_ = plane;
321  }
322 }
323 
324 
325 void lccp_segmentation::show_table_plane(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer){
326  pcl::visualization::PointCloudColorHandlerRGBField<PointT> rgb(this->table_plane_cloud_);
327  viewer->addPointCloud<PointT>(this->table_plane_cloud_, rgb, "table_plane_cloud");
328 }
329 
330 void lccp_segmentation::show_segmented_objects(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer){
331  pcl::PointCloud<PointTl> objects_cloud;
332  for(int i = 0; i < this->detected_objects_.size(); ++i){
333  pcl::PointCloud<PointTl> tmp_cloud;
334  for(int p = 0; p < this->detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud.size(); ++p){
335  PointTl tmp_point;
336  tmp_point.x = this->detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud[p].x;
337  tmp_point.y = this->detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud[p].y;
338  tmp_point.z = this->detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud[p].z;
339  tmp_point.label = this->detected_objects_[i].label;
340  tmp_cloud.points.push_back(tmp_point);
341  }
342  objects_cloud += tmp_cloud;
343  }
344  viewer->addPointCloud(objects_cloud.makeShared(), "segmented_object_cloud");
345 }
346 
347 void lccp_segmentation::clean_viewer(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer){
348  viewer->removePointCloud("supervoxel_cloud");
349  viewer->removePointCloud("supervoxel_normals");
350  viewer->removePointCloud("segemented_object_cloud");
351  viewer->removePointCloud("table_plane_cloud");
352  std::multimap<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).begin();
353  for( ; label_itr !=(this->supervoxel_adjacency_).end(); ){
354  uint32_t supervoxel_label = label_itr->first;
355  std::stringstream ss;
356  ss<<"supervoxel_"<<supervoxel_label;
357  viewer->removeShape(ss.str());
358  label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).upper_bound(supervoxel_label);
359  }
360 }
361 
362 std::vector<PointCloud> lccp_segmentation::get_segmented_objects_simple(){
363  std::vector<PointCloud> obj_vec;
364  for(int i = 0; i < this->detected_objects_.size(); ++i)
365  obj_vec.push_back(detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud);
366  return obj_vec;
367 }

372 /*
373 void lccp_segmentation::show_super_voxels(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer, bool show_adjacency_map, bool show_super_voxel_normals){
374  if(this->detected_objects_.size()>0){
375  viewer->addPointCloud(this->labeled_voxel_cloud_, "supervoxel_cloud");
376  if(show_super_voxel_normals)
377  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointNormal>(this->normal_cloud_, 1, 0.05f, "supervoxel_normals");
378  if(show_adjacency_map){
379  std::multimap<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).begin();
380  for( ; label_itr!= (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).end(); ){
381  uint32_t supervoxel_label = label_itr->first;
382  pcl::Supervoxel<PointT>::Ptr supervoxel = this->supervoxel_clusters_.at(supervoxel_label);
383  PointCloud adjacent_supervoxel_centers;
384  std::multimap<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator adjacent_itr = this->supervoxel_adjacency_.equal_range(supervoxel_label).first;
385  for( ; adjacent_itr!=this->supervoxel_adjacency_.equal_range(supervoxel_label).second; ++adjacent_itr){
386  pcl::Supervoxel<PointT>::Ptr neighbor_supervoxel = this->supervoxel_clusters_.at(adjacent_itr->second);
387  adjacent_supervoxel_centers.push_back(neighbor_supervoxel->centroid_);
388  }
389  std::stringstream ss;
390  ss<<"supervoxel_"<<supervoxel_label;
391  addSupervoxelConnectionsToViewer(supervoxel->centroid_, adjacent_supervoxel_centers, ss.str(), viewer);
392  label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).upper_bound(supervoxel_label);
393  }
394  }
395  }
396 }

398 void lccp_segmentation::show_super_voxels(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> &viewer){
399  if(this->detected_objects_.size()>0){
400  viewer->addPointCloud(this->labeled_voxel_cloud_, "supervoxel_cloud");
401  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointNormal>(this->normal_cloud_, 1, 0.05f, "supervoxel_normals");
402  std::multimap<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).begin();
403  for( ; label_itr!= (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).end(); ){
404  uint32_t supervoxel_label = label_itr->first;
405  pcl::Supervoxel<PointT>::Ptr supervoxel = this->supervoxel_clusters_.at(supervoxel_label);
406  PointCloud adjacent_supervoxel_centers;
407  std::multimap<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator adjacent_itr = this->supervoxel_adjacency_.equal_range(supervoxel_label).first;
408  for( ; adjacent_itr!=this->supervoxel_adjacency_.equal_range(supervoxel_label).second; ++adjacent_itr){

410  adjacent_supervoxel_centers.push_back(neighbor_supervoxel->centroid_);

415  label_itr = (this->supervoxel_adjacency_).upper_bound(supervoxel_label);
416  }
417  }

419 */
420 bool lccp_segmentation::segment(){
421  if(!this->initialized_){
422  pcl::console::print_error("No valid input given to the algorithm. The class has not been initialized");
423  return false;
424  }
425  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr obj_idx(new pcl::PointIndices());
426  detectObjectsOnTable(this->cloud_, this->zmin, this->zmax, obj_idx, true);
427  if(this->seed_resolution < 0.013)
428  pcl::console::print_warn("seed resolution very low, the segmentation could be fragmented.");
429  pcl::SupervoxelClustering<PointT> super(this->voxel_resolution, this->seed_resolution);
430  detected_objects_.resize(0);
431  if(this->cloud_->points.size() == 0){
432  pcl::console::print_warn("No objects on the table");
433  return false;
434  }
435  super.setInputCloud(this->cloud_);
436  super.setColorImportance(this->color_importance);
437  super.setSpatialImportance(this->spatial_importance);
438  super.setNormalImportance(this->normal_importance);
439 
440  super.extract(supervoxel_clusters_);
441  labeled_voxel_cloud_ = super.getLabeledVoxelCloud();
442  CloudPtr voxel_cetroid_cloud = super.getVoxelCentroidCloud();
443  normal_cloud_ = super.makeSupervoxelNormalCloud(supervoxel_clusters_);
444  PointCloudl::Ptr full_labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
445  super.getSupervoxelAdjacency(supervoxel_adjacency_);
446  std::map<uint32_t, pcl::Supervoxel<PointT>::Ptr> refined_supervoxel_clusters;
447 
448  PointCloudl::Ptr refined_labeled_voxel_cloud = super.getLabeledVoxelCloud();
449  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointNormal>::Ptr refined_sv_normal_cloud = super.makeSupervoxelNormalCloud(refined_supervoxel_clusters);
450  PointCloudl::Ptr refined_full_labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
451 
452  typedef boost::adjacency_list<boost::setS, boost::setS, boost::undirectedS, uint32_t, float> VoxelAdjacencyList;
453  VoxelAdjacencyList supervoxel_adjacency_list;
454  super.getSupervoxelAdjacencyList(supervoxel_adjacency_list);
455 
456  uint k_factor = 0;
457  if(use_extended_convexity)
458  k_factor = 1;
459 
460  pcl::LCCPSegmentation<PointT> lccp;
461  lccp.setConcavityToleranceThreshold(this->concavity_tolerance_threshold);
462  lccp.setSanityCheck(this->use_sanity_criterion);
463  lccp.setSmoothnessCheck(true, this->voxel_resolution, this->seed_resolution, this->smoothness_threshold);
464  lccp.setKFactor(k_factor);
465  lccp.setInputSupervoxels(this->supervoxel_clusters_, this->supervoxel_adjacency_);
466  lccp.setMinSegmentSize(this->min_segment_size);
467  lccp.segment();
468 
469  PointCloudl::Ptr labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
470  lccp_labeled_cloud_ = labeled_cloud->makeShared();
471  lccp.relabelCloud(*lccp_labeled_cloud_);
472 
473  for(int i=0;i < lccp_labeled_cloud_->points.size(); ++i){
474  uint32_t idx = lccp_labeled_cloud_->points.at(i).label;
475  if(idx >= detected_objects_.size())
476  detected_objects_.resize(idx+1);
477  PointT tmp_point_rgb;
478  tmp_point_rgb = cloud_->points.at(i);
479  detected_objects_[idx].obj_cloud.points.push_back(tmp_point_rgb);
480  detected_objects_[idx].label = (int)idx;
481  }
482 
483  int size = detected_objects_.size();
484  int i = 0;
485  while(i<size){
486  if(detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud.size() < this->th_points){
487  detected_objects_.erase(detected_objects_.begin()+i);
488  size = detected_objects_.size();
489  }
490  else
491  i++;
492  }
493  return true;
494 }
lccp_segmentation::get_seed_resolution

get seed resolution

Definition: segmentation_lccp.h:106
lccp_segmentation::get_segmented_objects_simple
